attributes.action: Automatic driving ban until driving test retake for 12 Points on a Licence.
attributes.additional_details:
Many People are Killed or Injured through car accidents. We think Saving Lives should be Paramount with Thousands Killed or Injured each year through drivers doing stupid things, we think drivers should be forced to retake their tests if they get 12 points. 
At the moment we think the Courts are Not Reducing the Dangerous Driver.
Vehicle’s are Weapons and must be driven Safely.
attributes.background: Make it an automatic driving ban until you retake your driving test when you reach 12 points on your driving licence. We think having some people with over 30 points still driving, makes a Mockery of the Law and is a Danger to others on our Roads.
